thread.title: thanks once again!!!
thread.title_full: thanks once again!!! - Review of Ibis Styles London Leyton, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Daniel S
title: thanks once again!!!
text: back in London again for my business trip staying at my favourite place in London which is Ibis Style Leyton. once again I receive a nice clean room and I can tell you the breakfast experience it is extraordinary compare with the price, and the staff starting from the room atender to the head housekeeper which is a lovely person and always into helping us and make our stay comfortable !!!
